Furniture Design: Print custom furniture designs on wood using a 3D printer. This allows for intricate designs and a personalized touch.
Jewelry Making: Print jewelry designs using a 3D printer and then add intricate details using paint or other materials. This creates one-of-a-kind pieces.
Architecture Model: Print architectural models using a 3D printer. This allows architects to quickly create detailed models of their designs for presentations or client meetings.
Bookends: Print custom bookends using a 3D printer. This adds a personal touch to a home library and can be customized with intricate designs.
Sculptural Art: Print sculptures using a 3D printer and then add paint or other materials to create a unique piece of art. This can be displayed in a gallery or private collection.
